p: We conducted a systematic search of Web of Science, PubMed and Science Direct Scopus electronic databases for relevant articles published from June 2007 to July 2020. Google Scholar was used to identify any articles not included in the above databases. The search terms included a combination of the following keywords: algae, alternative medicine, ataxia, basidiomycete, complementary medicine, herbal, herbs, medicinal plants, medicinal mushrooms, mushrooms, natural products, plants and seaweed. The structured search strategy was designed to include all papers that evaluated the use of natural remedies as a treatment for HA published from June 2007 to July 2020.
